wikipedia_page.main: Jack Reynolds (John Reynolds) (23 September 1881 – 8 November 1962) was an English football manager and player. He was the manager of Ajax Amsterdam from 1915–1925, 1928–1940, and 1945–1947. He was one of the pioneers of the Total Football system of playing and is considered among the best managers the team has had. He also managed Swiss side St Gallen.
